data.title: Great Hockey
data.text: S. Carolina has a great minor league Hockey Team ~ don't let the name fool you, these boys play to win!  The price is right for a great night of hockey entertainment, you will not leave disappointed!

data.title: My  Wellness Center is Waiting for YOU
data.text: This center is making history in health care and has so many aspect for everyone that need special attention in health.

data.title: Now called the Swamp Rabbits !  Greenville's Hockey Team.
data.text: Originally from Detroit, we had to check out the local hockey team.  Great fun, decent hockey playing, beautiful arena.  Fun things for the kids during play breaks.  Food and beverages are priced little high (typical for a sports venue), but ticket prcies are very reasonable.  Fun night out with the kids / grandkids.

data.title: Swamp Rabbits
data.text: This team has new management and is now called the Swamp Rabbits.  Great night out if you're a hockey fan

data.title: it's Hockey, what more can you say, eh?
data.text: Despite the less than glamorous name change to "Swamp Rabbits", Greenville's very own Minor League Hockey is great fun.  Even when full, the Arena is manageable, with lines at concessions and such not being all too long.  Greenville plays pretty good hockey, and compete against a number of other sub-NHL teams in the southwest.  if you are lucky, you might see the next NHL Star before he is one!

data.title: Cheap and fun
data.text: Something different for an evening. Cheap tickets and a lot of action. Food choices are limited so I suggest eating before or after the game.

data.title: New team name but still a great time with the family.
data.text: No longer the Road Warriors, now the Swamp Rabbits but still good fun. It's a always a blast taking the kids to see a game but it can get overshadowed sometimes by the promotional stunts that fill in for entertainment.

data.title: We went and a hockey game broke out!
data.text: We go once a year with our neighbors. We also go when we need a great night out for the family. It is a great place for the old and young a like.

data.title: Road Warriors is now the Swamp Rabbits
data.text: The hockey is very entertaining and fun to watch.  The new name is very unique and will cause a lot of discussions on whether it is an appropriate name for a hockey team; but in time, people will come around to it and embrace it as special to the people of this area.

data.title: They play hard..
data.text: Yes, it's low level ice hockey. ECHL. but the players play hard and the team puts on an entertaining game. The music and  such provide for a great family experience. Always glad that hockey is played in the south

data.title: Hockey time
data.text: Took parents and scouts to scout night at hockey game as we do every year. They lose every year but fun to watch hockey in the south. Always a sellout crowd with scout night.
